mapper.update: UPDATE user_assistance SET assistance =#{1} WHERE openId=#{0}
mapper.select: SELECT assistance from user_assistance WHERE binary openId = #{openId}

SELECT a.assistance,a.groupId,b.distance,a.classId,d.className,k.groupName FROM (select groupId, classId,sum(assistance) as assistance from cheer_assistance where openId = #{0} group by classId order by assistance desc)a, (SELECT classId ,sum(assistance) AS distance from cheer_assistance group by classId)b,(SELECT * from cheer_info)d,(SELECT groupName ,groupId from group_info)k WHERE a.classId=b.classId and a.classId = d.classId and a.groupId = k.groupId
